data.text: @BlackAlmo If a kindergarten schoolchild were to draw a picture showing what a 'happy& successful man in SA looks like', they would quickly draw these pics⁉️🥴Then again, our pupils are NOT that dumb? 🙈These slobs, flaunting ill-gotten wealth are unhealthy,can't be happy&must be ashamed?🎃
@BlackAlmo You need forklift to lift these guys 🤣🤣🤣🤣 money makes you oily
